question:
Which among the following mountains and their continents is/are correctly matched?
  1. Mount Everest - Asia
  2. Mount Kilimanjaro - Europe
  3. Mount Mckinley - Africa
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Mount Kilimajaro, Tanzania is the tallest mountain in Africa. It is the highest single free-standing mountain in the world. It is made up of extinct volcanoes. 

Mt. Mckinley, also known as Denali is the highest mountain in North American continent. It is 6168 metres. It is located on USA in the state of Alaska.
